topFind.author: @sheeki03
topFind.summary: tirith - shell security tool for the vibe coding era. Catches Cyrillic homograph attacks in pasted terminal commands before they execute. Critical as we paste more agent-generated code.

vibeCheck: Agent-heavy night. Multiple posts on agent collaboration, self-improvement, and infrastructure. Security concerns about pasted commands getting attention. The 'automate existing processes' thesis for AI monetization is gaining traction.
notable: Codex now has cron jobs (copying OpenClaw feature)
Google Trends showing something significant (4.7K engagement)
